about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a remote village shrouded in mysteries. You are a brave hero on a mission to find your missing uncle, who vanished deep within ancient caves. But something strange awaits you inside — after a collapse, a new passage reveals technologies that seem otherworldly.

Explore underground labyrinths, solve intricate puzzles, and forge your path using cubes, floating platforms, bridges, cylinders, and pressure plates. These puzzles are the only key to moving forward, and each solved mystery brings you closer to uncovering your uncle's fate.

Prepare for an exciting journey where the atmosphere of a remote village and mysterious caves intertwines with technology beyond ordinary understanding.

Key Features:

• Atmospheric environment inspired by a secluded village and mysterious caves
• Unique puzzle mechanics: cubes, platforms, bridges, doors, and more
• Detailed locations, from the quiet village to ancient caves
• Puzzles that require logical thinking and attentiveness
• A gradually unfolding story revealing secrets of the past

Explore underground labyrinths, solve intricate puzzles, and forge your path using cubes, floating platforms, bridges, cylinders, and pressure plates. These puzzles are the only key to moving forward, and each solved mystery brings you closer to uncovering your uncle's fate.

name: Void Point

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (20H1 version or newer, 64-bit versions)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Core i5-2500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 Fury or GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore mysterious caves in a secluded village, solving puzzles and uncovering secrets of otherworldly technology to find your missing uncle. Are you ready to take on the journey?
